Study Title: A Study for Aggressive Adult T-cell Leukemia-lymphoma (ATLL)
Brief Summary: To test the superiority of VCAP-AMP-VECP regimen over biweekly-CHOP in aggressive ATLL in terms of survival benefit.
Interventions: DRUG: VCAP-AMP-VECP with G-CSF and intrathecal prophylaxis|DRUG: biweekly-CHOP with G-CSF and intrathecal prophylaxis
Collaborators: Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare, Japan
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
Locations: Nagasaki University Graduate School of Biomedical Science, Nagasaki, 852-8523, Japan
